title: Most Effective Government
description: In 2023, Switzerland achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Government Effectiveness percentile rank, indicating the highest level of government effectiveness globally.

title: Highest Domestic Private Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Switzerland had the highest domestic private health expenditure per capita, spending $7,131.24 per person.

title: Highest Out-of-Pocket Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Switzerland had the highest out-of-pocket health expenditure per capita at $2,366.21.

title: Lowest Reserves and Related Items
description: In 2023, Switzerland had the lowest reserves and related items, with a negative balance of -$132 billion.
